front.title: IPv6 RA Options for Next Hop Routes

abstract.t: This document proposes new Router Advertisement options for configuring next hop routes on the mobile or fixed nodes. Using these options, an operator can easily configure nodes with multiple interfaces (or otherwise multi-homed) to enable them to select the routes to a destination. Each option is defined together with definitions of host and router behaviors. This document also proposes the router advertisement extensions for source address dependent routing.
